name: Nusquids
body:
### Welcome to nuSQuIDS.
nuSQuIDS is a neutrino oscillation software build on SQuIDS (https://github.com/jsalvado/SQuIDS), which was published in Computer Physics Communications (http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0010465515002672). It has been designed to be a fast and flexible library to calculate neutrino oscillations.

### Authors and Contributors
The main authors and contributors of nuSQuIDs are: Carlos Arg√ºelles (@arguelles), Jordi Salvado (@jsalvado), and Chris Weaver (@cnweaver). If you are interested in contributing to the project please sent us a message. 

### Support or Contact
If you are having trouble with the package please sent an email to caad@mit.edu.
